1.title: Every Day is Taco Tuesday!

episode of.title: Off the Cuff: Healthy Cooking with Craig Mitchell (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: Comedian and amateur chef Craig Mitchell starts season 2 with a Taco made with spiced turkey and an air fried low carb flour tortilla shell.

2.title: Air Fried Eggplant Parmesan

episode of.title: Off the Cuff: Healthy Cooking with Craig Mitchell (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: Comedian and Chef Craig Mitchell, makes Air Fried Eggplant Parmesan in this homage to the classic 1970's TV Shows "The Six Million Dollar Man" and "The Bionic Woman"

3.title: Mushroom: Impossible!

episode of.title: Off the Cuff: Healthy Cooking with Craig Mitchell (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Comedian and Amateur Chef Craig Mitchell makes Air Fried, low carb and low calorie Four Cheese Stuff Mushrooms. In this homage to Mission: Impossible and other pop culture icons.

4.title: The MARVEL of Low Carb Shepherd's Pie

episode of.title: Off the Cuff: Healthy Cooking with Craig Mitchell (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: Comedian and Amateur Chef Craig Mitchell make a low carb, low calorie Shepherd's Pie using Mashed Cauliflower in this homage to Marvel Movies and TV Shows.

5.title: Craig and Craig's Hummus Adventure!

episode of.title: Off the Cuff: Healthy Cooking with Craig Mitchell (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: Comedian and amateur chef Craig Mitchell demonstrates who to make low carb almond based Hummus and low carb home made Tortilla Chips (in an air fryer)

6.title: Pretzels! Pretzels! Get your Low Carb Pretzels Here!

episode of.title: Off the Cuff: Healthy Cooking with Craig Mitchell (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: Comedian and amateur chef Craig Mitchell demonstrates his recipe for low carb soft pretzels made in the Air Fryer and using Almond Flour.

7.title: The Ultimate Low Carb Comfort Food: Cauliflower Mac N Cheese

episode of.title: Off the Cuff: Healthy Cooking with Craig Mitchell (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: Comedian and amateur chef Craig Mitchell demonstrates how to make INCREDIBLE low carb Mac N Cheese using Cauliflower.

8.title: Fighting Crime (and Carbs) with Biscuits and Gravy

episode of.title: Off the Cuff: Healthy Cooking with Craig Mitchell (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: Comedian, Actor and amateur chef Craig Mitchell makes Low Carb Biscuits with Low Calorie, Low Carb Turkey Sausage Gravy while spoofing 70's cop shows.

9.title: Breaking Bad with a Low Carb Breakfast Burrito

episode of.title: Off the Cuff: Healthy Cooking with Craig Mitchell (TV Series 2017– )

9.plot: Comedian and amateur chef Craig Mitchell shares and demonstrates his recipe for a low carb Breakfast Burrito.

10.title: Low Carb Pizza Party

episode of.title: Off the Cuff: Healthy Cooking with Craig Mitchell (TV Series 2017– )

10.plot: Comedian and amateur chef Craig Mitchell, creates a low carb Pepperoni and Turkey Sausage Pizza from scratch and features Do's and Don't while Air Frying.

11.title: Air Fried Mozzarella Styx Done Two Ways!

episode of.title: Off the Cuff: Healthy Cooking with Craig Mitchell (TV Series 2017– )

11.plot: Comedian and amateur chef Craig Mitchell shares his recipe for Air Fried Mozzarella Sticks.

12.title: The Mother of All Recipes: Air Fried Stuffed Peppers

episode of.title: Off the Cuff: Healthy Cooking with Craig Mitchell (TV Series 2017– )

12.plot: Comedian and amateur chef Craig Mitchell shares his healthy spin on his Mother's Stuff Pepper recipe. Featuring ground turkey and cauliflower rice stuffing.

13.title: Low Carb Cheeseburger, Cheeseburger, Cheeseburger!

episode of.title: Off the Cuff: Healthy Cooking with Craig Mitchell (TV Series 2017– )

13.plot: Comedian and amateur chef Craig Mitchell shares his home spun recipe for a low carb Cheeseburger Wrap.

14.title: Attack of the Giant (Low Carb) Pigs in a Blanket

episode of.title: Off the Cuff: Healthy Cooking with Craig Mitchell (TV Series 2017– )

14.plot: Comedian and Amateur Chef Craig Mitchell demonstrates his own recipe for FULL SIZE, Low Carb Pigs in a blanket.

episode of.title: Off the Cuff: Healthy Cooking with Craig Mitchell (TV Series 2017– )

15.plot: Comedian and Amateur chef Craig Mitchell demonstrates how to make lower calorie DEVILED EGGS using an air fryer.

16.title: Let there be Bacon!

episode of.title: Off the Cuff: Healthy Cooking with Craig Mitchell (TV Series 2017– )

16.plot: Comedian and amateur chef Craig Mitchell demonstrates a Low Carb BLT Wrap using Pork and Turkey Bacon.

episode of.title: Off the Cuff: Healthy Cooking with Craig Mitchell (TV Series 2017– )
